name: Untitled Experiment
description:
So basically this is an an experiment.

I wanted to do a little (maybe it'll turn out into a big one) experiment. How much can I build and how many mechanics can I add on top of this basic "game" without any design plan.

Can I turn this little nonsense into a game, without even knowing where I'm going with this?

I want to find out where this project will lead me without any predefined guidelines or destination.

Features

- Walk left and right. 

- An outstanding ability to walk off the screen and go on an imaginary adventure.

What's new?

- NOTHING! This is the basic state.

Current version

V. 0.0.0 (Update no 0).
